Disposable
public class ConeLight
extends PositionalLight
Light shaped as a circle's sector with given radius, direction and angle

  • Constructor Details

    • ConeLight

      public ConeLight​(RayHandler rayHandler, int rays, Color color, float distance, float x, float y, float directionDegree, float coneDegree)
      Creates light shaped as a circle's sector with given radius, direction and arc angle
      Parameters:
      rayHandler - not null instance of RayHandler
      rays - number of rays - more rays make light to look more realistic but will decrease performance, can't be less than MIN_RAYS
      color - color, set to null to use the default color
      distance - distance of cone light
      x - axis position
      y - axis position
      directionDegree - direction of cone light
      coneDegree - half-size of cone light, centered over direction

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()

    • setDirection

      public void setDirection​(float direction)
      Sets light direction

      Actual recalculations will be done only on update() call

      Specified by:
      setDirection in class Light

    • getConeDegree

      public float getConeDegree()
      Returns:
      this lights cone degree

    • setConeDegree

      public void setConeDegree​(float coneDegree)
      How big is the arc of cone

      Arc angle = coneDegree * 2, centered over direction angle

      Actual recalculations will be done only on update() call

    • setDistance

      public void setDistance​(float dist)
      Sets light distance

      MIN value capped to 0.1f meter

      Actual recalculations will be done only on update() call

      Specified by:
      setDistance in class Light

    • setEndPoints

      protected void setEndPoints()
      Updates lights sector basing on distance, direction and coneDegree
